name: The Lafon Chair
description: The Lafon is a statement chair featuring a bold, modern profile that conveys both a subtle opulence and timeless elegance. The dark tinted beech of the frame and legs sits satisfyingly alongside the slightly more subtle tones of the upholstery. Tapered legs and an angular backrest give the Lafon its sleek design that exudes self-assured sophistication. For a touch of high-end luxury, DAVIDSON offers upholstery in a fabric or leather of your choice â€“ creating an ideal companion to your interior style.
